<script>if (!window.google_tag_params) {window.google_tag_params = {};}window.google_tag_manager_tracker = 'GTM-WJPW7G';
        window.GTMPush = function (params) {
            dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];

            params = typeof params != 'undefined' ? params : {};

            if (Object.prototype.toString.call(params) === '[object Array]') {
                params = {};
            }

            params.google_tag_params = window.google_tag_params || {};

            if (typeof params.google_tag_params.ecomm_pagetype == 'undefined') {
                params.google_tag_params.ecomm_pagetype = 'other';
            }

            
            dataLayer.push(params);
        };
        </script>
    <script>
        (function (w, d, s, l, i) {
            w[l] = w[l] || [];
            w[l].push({
                'gtm.start':
                    new Date().getTime(),
                event: 'gtm.js'
            });
            var f = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
                j = d.createElement(s),
                dl = l != 'dataLayer' ? '&l=' + l : '';
            j.async = true;
            j.src = '//www.googletagmanager.com/gtm.js?id=' + i + dl;
            f.parentNode.insertBefore(j, f);
        })(window, document, 'script', 'dataLayer', 'GTM-WJPW7G');

        window.gtm_products = [];
    </script>

data-proadmin-id="el-menu-item"><strong>CİLT BAKIM RUTİNİ</strong></a></li></ul></div></div></div><!-- Content Gallery Start --><div class="col-sm-12 pro-header-content-gallery-wrapper text-center"><div class="text-center pro-header-refresh-campaign-banner"><p><span rel="font-size: 20px;" style="font-size: 20px;"><span rel="font-size: 18pt;" style="font-size: 18pt;" data-redactor-style="font-size: 18pt;"><strong data-redactor-tag="strong">Tüm Alışverişlerde 30ml Müşteri Favorisi Vücut Nemlendiricisi Hediye! Kod: RETRO</strong></span></span></p></div></div><style>.pro-header-content-gallery-wrapper {display: table;vertical-align: middle;height: 60px;background: #FFF;}.pro-header-refresh-campaign-banner {display: table-cell;vertical-align: middle;height: 60px;font-size: 18px;}</style><!-- Content Gallery End --></div></div></div><style>.pro-header-menu .nav > li:last-child,.pro-header-menu .nav > li:first-child{text-align: center;}</style><style>.pro-header-menu{border-bottom:solid 1px #cccccc;}</style>
    <script>
        function debounce(func, wait, immediate) {
            var timeout;
            return function() {
                var context = this, args = arguments;
                var later = function() {
                    timeout = null;
                    if (!immediate) func.apply(context, args);
                };
                var callNow = immediate && !timeout;
                clearTimeout(timeout);
                timeout = setTimeout(later, wait);
                if (callNow) func.apply(context, args);
            };
        };

        var lastPageTop = 0;
        var myEfficientFn = debounce(function () {
            var pageTop = $(window).scrollTop();
            var $container = $('#pro-fixed-header');
            if (pageTop >= $('#main-header').height()) {
                $container.removeClass('hidden');
            } else {
                $container.addClass('hidden');
            }
            if(lastPageTop > pageTop){
                debounce(function () {
                    if($container.find("#menu").hasClass('hidden')) {
                        //console.log("page up :" + ($container.find("#menu").hasClass('hidden')));
                        $container.find("#menu").removeClass('hidden');
                    }
                }, 50)();
            } else {
                debounce(function () {
                    if(!$container.find("#menu").hasClass('hidden')) {
                        //console.log("page down :" + (!$container.find("#menu").hasClass('hidden')));
                        $container.find("#menu").addClass('hidden');
                    }
                }, 50)();
            }
            lastPageTop = pageTop;
        }, 1);
        $(window).on('scroll', myEfficientFn);
    </script>


    <script>
        $(function(){
            $('.pro-others-menu-item>a').on('click', function(){
                var href = $(this).attr('href'); if(href!='#'){ window.location.href=href; }
            });
        });
    </script>


<script id="newsletterPopupContainer" type="text/html">
    <div class="clearfix" style="padding: 20px 0">
        <div class="col-md-12">
            <div class="col-md-5">
                <img src="https://epmajuiy.rocketcdn.com/kiehls/img/content/18-09/05/757983478325582dwzxik4jmijx2wmbfsyw_height640.png" alt="" />
            </div>
            <div class="col-md-7 text-center">
                                <h1>
                    Her Alışverişinize 3 Adet Deneme Boyu Hediye!
                </h1>
                                                <form class="pro-footer-middle-form with-checkbox" action="#" id="newsletter-form-1">
                     <input type="text" class="form-control" name="EMAIL" placeholder="E-posta adresi" />
                     <div class="text-left">
                         <label class="pro-checkbox accept-terms-and-conditions-for-newsletter-header" data-proadmin-id="accept-terms-and-conditions-for-newsletter-header" style="text-align:left;">
                            <input type="checkbox" style="min-height:10px !important;" id="accept-terms-and-conditions-for-newsletter-header" />
                            <span></span>
                            <p>
                                Bana özel indirim ve ayrıcalıklardan e-posta ile haberdar olmak istiyorum.
                            </p>
                         </label>
                     </div>
                                            <div class="agreement-for-newsletter-header col-xs-12 p0 text-left" data-proadmin-id="el-accept-terms-and-conditions-for-newsletter" style="color:#000;">
                            <label class="pro-checkbox">
                                <input type="checkbox" style="width: auto;min-height:10px !important;" id="agreement-for-newsletter-header">
                                <span></span>
                                                                    <p><a href="/s/kullanim-kosullari" target="_blank">Kullanıcı S&ouml;zleşmesini&nbsp;</a>ve&nbsp;<a href="http://www.loreal.com.tr/sites/default/files/docs/1-_kisisel_verilerin_islenmesine_yonelik_aydinlatma_metni_ve_cerez_politika.pdf" target="_blank">Kişisel Verilerin Korunmasına Y&ouml;nelik Aydınlatma Metnini&nbsp;</a>okudum ve onaylıyorum</p>
                                                            </label>
                        </div>
                                        <button class="btn btn-default">
                        KAYIT OL
                    </button>
                </form>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</script>

</div></div></div></div></div></div></div><script>(window._GTM_promotions = (window._GTM_promotions||[])).push({id: '510212',name: 'Anasayfa Kullanıcı Yorumu 1',creative: 'Banner',position: '1'});</script><script>(window._GTM_promotions = (window._GTM_promotions||[])).push({id: '510210',name: 'Anasayfa Kullanıcı Yorumu 2',creative: 'Banner',position: '2'});</script><script>(window._GTM_promotions = (window._GTM_promotions||[])).push({id: '510209',name: 'Anasayfa Kullanıcı Yorumu 3',creative: 'Banner',position: '3'});</script><style>#pro-content-list-3111 {margin-top:0px !important;margin-bottom:0px !important;}.pro-content-list-gallery {margin-bottom: 30px;}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-content-list-header{height:43px;line-height:43px;line-height:43px;}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-content-list-title{font-size: 20px;font-weight: 400;color: #000000;line-height: 43px;}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-content-list-title img{max-width: 30px !important;}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-campaign-banner-as-comment{}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-campaign-banner-as-comment img{}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-content-list-element-image img{width: 100% !important;}#pro-content-list-3111 .pro-campaign-banner-image-shadow {width: calc(100% - <script id="listMarkup" type="text/html">
    <% _.each(items, function(item, index) { %>
    <div class="col-sm-3 pro-gallery-item swiper-slide">
        <div class="pro-gallery-item-wrapper">
            <div class="pro-media-carousel">
                <img data-component-index="<%= index + startIndex %>" class="pro-gallery-photo" data-blank-src="/assets/pro/img/_blank_1x1.png" src="<%= item.media_link_m %>">
                <!--div class="swiper-lazy-preloader"></div-->
            </div>
            <div class="pro-gallery-item-channel-icon">
                                    <a target="_blank" href="<%= item.media_seo %>">
                        <i class="fa fa-instagram"></i>
                    </a>
                            </div>
                    </div>
    </div>
    <% }) %>
</script>
<script id="lightBoxItemMarkup" type="text/html">
    <% productIndex = 1 %>
    <% _.each(items, function(item, index) { %>
    <li data-index="<%= (index + startIndex) %>" class="pro-light-box-item">
        <div class="pro-light-box-item-image-wrapper">
            <a href="<%= item.owner_media_seo %>" target="_blank">
                <img class="instagram" src="/assets/pro/img/_blank_1x1.png" data-src="<%= item.media_link %>">
            </a>
        </div>
        <div class="pro-light-box-item-galery-wrapper">
            <div class="pro-light-box-gallery-header">
                <div><a href="<%= item.owner_media_seo %>" class="pro-media-title"><%= item.owner_name %></a></div>
                                <% if (item.media_shared_time) { %>
                <div><a href="<%= item.media_seo %>" class="pro-media-description"><%= item.media_shared_time %></a></div>
                <% } %>
                            </div>
            <div class="pro-light-box-gallery">
                <% if (item.text) { %>
                <div class="pro-media-description"><%= item.text %></div>
                <% } %>
                <% if (item.products.length > 2) { %>
                <div class="pro-light-box-gallery-prev">
                    <a href="javascript:;" class="pro-light-box-gallery-other" data-action="prev">
                        <i class="pro-icon-angle-left" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </div>
                <div class="pro-light-box-gallery-next">
                    <a href="javascript:;" class="pro-light-box-gallery-other" data-action="next">
                        <i class="pro-icon-angle-right" aria-hidden="true"></i>
                    </a>
                </div>
                <% }  %>
                <ul class="pro-light-box-gallery-items" data-index="${index}">
                    <% _.each(item.products, function(product, i) { %>
                    <li class="<% if (i == 0) { %>active_product<% } %> text-center -GTM-product-item" data-key-index="<%= index + startIndex %>.<%= i %>"
                        data-GTM-product-id="<%= product.id||'' %>"
                        data-GTM-position="<%= productIndex %>"
                        data-GTM-list="recommendation/instagram"
                    >
                        <a class="pro-light-box-gallery-item-link -GTM-product-click-action" href="<%= product.seo %>">
                            <div>
                                <img src="/assets/pro/img/_blank_1x1.png" data-src="<% if (product.product_image) { %><%= product.product_image %><% } else { %> <%= item.media_link %> <% } %>" />
                            </div>
                            <div class="pro-light-box-gallery-item-title"><span><%= product.name %></span></div>
                                                            <div class="pro-rating-wrapper">
                                    <div class="stars-wrapper">
                                        <div>
                                            <% _.forEach([1, 2, 3, 4, 5], function(value) { %>
                                            <i class="fa fa-heart<% if (value <= product.rating) { %> active<% } %>" title="good" data-score="<%= value %>"></i>
                                            <% }) %>
                                            <input type="hidden" name="score" value="<%= product.rating %>" readonly="readonly">
                                        </div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                                                        <div>
                                <a class="primary-button" href="<%= product.seo %>">
                                    SATIN AL
                                </a>
                            </div>
                        </a>
                    </li>
                    <% }) %>
                </ul>
            </div>
            <div class="pro-light-box-social-horizontal-list" style="position: absolute;bottom: 0;width: 400px;">
                <div class="">
                    <div class=" content_asset footer-promo-asset ">
                        <div class="pro-light-box-social-wrapper">
                            <div class="text-center pro-light-box-social-header">
                                <h4 class="pro-light-box-social-title">
                                                                        PAYLAŞMAK GÜZELDİR
                                                                    </h4>
                            </div>
                            <span class="t-center">
                                <% if (social) { /* social - start */ %>
                                    <ul>
                                        <% if (social.facebook) { /* facebook - start */ %>
                                            <li>
                                                <a href="<%= social.facebook %>"><span class="text">Facebook</span><i class="fa fa-facebook"></i></a>
                                            </li>
                                        <% } /* facebook - end */ %>

                                        <% if (social.twitter) { /* twitter - start */ %>
                                            <li>
                                                <a href="<%= social.twitter %>"><span class="text">Twitter</span><i class="fa fa-twitter"></i></a>
                                            </li>
                                        <% } /* twitter - end */ %>

                                        <% if (social.instagram) { /* instagram - start */ %>
                                            <li>
                                                <a href="<%= social.instagram %>"><span class="text">Instagram</span><i class="fa fa-instagram"></i></a>
                                            </li>
                                        <% } /* instagram - end */ %>

                                        <% } /* googleplus - end */ %>

                                            </li>

                                        <% if (social.blog.blog_link) { /* blog_link - start */ %>

                                                <a href="<%= social.blog.blog_link %>" class="pro-footer-middle-section-social-blog-link"  target="_blank" rel="nofollow"><span class="text">${social.blog.blog_name}</span></a>
                                            </li>
                                        <% } /* youtube - blog_link */ %>
                                    </ul>
                                <% } /* social - end */ %>
                            </span>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </li>
    <% }) %>
</script>

<script type="jquery/tmpl" id="ssv3-header-template">
    <span class="ssv3-header-stats">
        <span id="ssv3-timer" class="poll"><time>
            {{if (window.ssv3.time||'').substr(0, 2) == '00'}}
                ${window.ssv3.time.substr(3, window.ssv3.time.length)}
            {{else}}
                ${window.ssv3.time}
            {{/if}}
        </time></span>
        {{if poll_info.voteCount != 0}}
                <i class="white-line"></i>
            ${poll_info.voteCount} 
        {{/if}}
    </span>
    <span class="ssv3-header-text">
        ${question_info.questionText}
    </span>
    <span class="ssv3-header-right">
        {{if poll_info.image_sponsor}}
           <a href="${poll_info.sponsor_link}" target="_blank">
               <img src="${poll_info.image_sponsor}" alt="">
           </a>
        {{/if}}
    </span>

</script>

                    %0
                </div>
