<div id="fb-root" class=" fb_reset"><div style="position: absolute; top: -10000px; width: 0px; height: 0px;"><div><iframe name="fbe24fefdeed88" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true" allowfullscreen="true" scrolling="no" allow="encrypted-media" src="https://www.facebook.com/connect/ping?client_id=121708341801614&amp;domain=www.kiehls.com.tr&amp;origin=1&amp;redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fstaticxx.facebook.com%2Fconnect%2Fxd_arbiter.php%3Fversion%3D44%23cb%3Df272ed381084b44%26domain%3Dwww.kiehls.com.tr%26origin%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.kiehls.com.tr%252Ff1897ff8304c448%26relation%3Dparent&amp;response_type=token%2Csigned_request&amp;sdk=joey" style="display: none;"></iframe></div><div><iframe name="fb_xdm_frame_https" id="fb_xdm_frame_https" aria-hidden="true" title="Facebook Cross Domain Communication Frame" tabindex="-1" frameborder="0" allowtransparency="true" allowfullscreen="true" scrolling="no" allow="encrypted-media" src="https://staticxx.facebook.com/connect/xd_arbiter.php?version=44#channel=f1897ff8304c448&amp;origin=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kiehls.com.tr" style="border: none;"></iframe></div></div></div>
<script>window.twttr = (function (d, s, id) {
        var js,
            fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0],
            t = window.twttr || {};
        if (d.getElementById(id)) return t;
        js = d.createElement(s);
        js.id = id;
        js.src = 'https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js';
        fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);

        t._e = [];
        t.ready = function (f) {
            t._e.push(f);
        };

        return t;
    }(document, 'script', 'twitter-wjs'));</script>
<script src="/assets/secondscreen/ssv3/assets/js/twttr-txt.js"></script>
<style>
    .incorrect {
        background-color: rgba(178, 34, 34, .5) !important;
    }

    .correct {
        background-color: rgba(46, 139, 87, .5) !important;
    }
</style>
<script>
    window.requiredMember = 

        $(function () {
            var PATH_ALIAS = 'https://epmajuiy.rocketcdn.com/kiehls/img/article_s/';


            window.getTweetLength = function (text, options) {
                if (!options) {
                    options = {
                        short_url_length: 22,
                        short_url_length_https: 23
                    };
                }
                if (!text) {
                    text = '';
                }
                var textLength = text.length;
                var urlsWithIndices = twttr.txt.extractUrlsWithIndices(text);

                for (var i = 0; i < urlsWithIndices.length; i++) {
                    // Subtract the length of the original URL
                    textLength += urlsWithIndices[i].indices[0] - urlsWithIndices[i].indices[1];

                    // Add 21 characters for URL starting with https://
                    // Otherwise add 20 characters
                    if (urlsWithIndices[i].url.toLowerCase()
                        .match(/^https:\/\//)) {
                        textLength += options.short_url_length_https;
                    } else {
                        textLength += options.short_url_length;
                    }
                }

                return textLength;
            };

            function charactersleft(tweet) {
                return 140 - window.getTweetLength(tweet);
            }

            var colors = {
                'red': '#A33038',
                'green': '#007A50',
                'orange': '#FF5A00',
                'black': '#000000',
                'white': '#FFFFFF',
                'blue': '#0085CF',
                'purple': '#673BB8',
                'brown': '#6F4C23',
                'yellow': '#FFA12D',
                'pink': '#D40072',
                'soft_green': '#9C9100',
                'navy_blue': '#002596'
            };

            window.convertHex = function (hexOrName, opacity) {
                if (!opacity) {
                    opacity = 100;
                }

                var hex;
                if (hexOrName.indexOf('#') == -1) {
                    if (colors.hasOwnProperty(hexOrName)) {
                        hex = colors[hexOrName];
                    } else {
                        return hexOrName;
                    }
                } else {
                    hex = hexOrName;
                }

                hex = hex.replace('#', '');

                r = parseInt(hex.substring(0, 2), 16);
                g = parseInt(hex.substring(2, 4), 16);
                b = parseInt(hex.substring(4, 6), 16);

                result = 'rgba(' + r + ',' + g + ',' + b + ',' + opacity / 100 + ')';
                return result;
            };

            String.prototype.turkishToUpper = function () {
                var string = this;
                var letters = {
                    'i': 'İ',
                    'ş': 'Ş',
                    'ğ': 'Ğ',
                    'ü': 'Ü',
                    'ö': 'Ö',
                    'ç': 'Ç',
                    'ı': 'I'
                };
                string = string.replace(/(([iışğüçö]))+/g, function (letter) {
                    return letters[letter];
                });
                return string.toUpperCase();
            };

            String.prototype.turkishToLower = function () {
                var string = this;
                var letters = {
                    'İ': 'i',
                    'I': 'ı',
                    'Ş': 'ş',
                    'Ğ': 'ğ',
                    'Ü': 'ü',
                    'Ö': 'ö',
                    'Ç': 'ç'
                };
                string = string.replace(/(([İIŞĞÜÇÖ]))+/g, function (letter) {
                    return letters[letter];
                });
                return string.toLowerCase();
            };

            var is_flash = 0;
            var $player = $('.videodetail_play object');
            if (!$player.length) {
                $player = $('.videodetail_play iframe');
            }
            if (!$player.length) {
                var is_flash = 1;
                $player = $('.videodetail_play');
            }
            if (!$player.length) {
                $player = $('.pro-electronic-program-broadcasting-video-videojs');
            }

            window.player_second = 0;

            if (!$('#secondscreen').length) {

                var $secondScreenEl = $('<div></div>')
                    .attr({
                        id: 'secondscreen',
                        'data-program-id': '',
                        'data-tv-channel-id': ''
                    })
                    .css({
                        width: '100%',
                        height: '25px',
                        position: 'absolute',
                        top: 0,
                        zIndex: 1042,
                        left: 0,
                        overflow: 'hidden'
                    });

                if (is_flash) {
                    $player.prepend($secondScreenEl);
                    $player.css('position', 'relative');
                } else {
                    $player.parent()
                        .prepend($secondScreenEl);
                }

            } else {
                var $secondScreenEl = $('#secondscreen');
            }

            var wrapperMarkup =
                '<div class="ssv3-wrapper" id="ssv3-el" style="height:100%;">' +
                '<div class="ssv3-container ">' +
                '</div>' +
                '</div>';
            $('#secondscreen')
            /*.hide()*/
                .html(wrapperMarkup);

            var changeSecondScreenResize = function () {
                var height = $('.ssv3-container-types:visible .ssv3-content-el')
                    .innerHeight() + 50;
                $('.ssv3-content-wrapper')
                    .css('height', height);

                $secondScreenEl.css('height', height + 25);
            };

            var ssv3 = new SSV3($('#ssv3-el'), {
                apiUrl: '',
                defaultSection: '',
                permissions: {
                    survey: false,
                    tvguide: false,
                    facebook: false,
                    twitter: false                },
                templates: {
                    survey: {
                        markup: $('#survey-template')
                            .html(),
                        callback: function ($el) {

                            var swiper = new Swiper($el.find('.ssv3-content-survey-bottom > .swiper-container'), {
                                slidesPerView: 'auto',
                                centeredSlides: false,
                                spaceBetween: 0,
                                nextButton: $el.find('.swiper-button-survey-next')
                                    .get(0),
                                prevButton: $el.find('.swiper-button-survey-prev')
                                    .get(0)
                            });


                            RG.pullTweets(SecondScreen.itemId, function () {
                                var tweets = RG.tweets;
                                $.each(tweets, function (key, item) {
                                    swiper.appendSlide($($.tmpl($('#twitter-bottom-template'), item))[0].outerHTML);
                                });
                            });

                            window.renderAnsweredUsers = function (data) {
                                swiper.removeAllSlides();

                                if (!data.length) {

                                    RG.pullTweets(SecondScreen.itemId, function () {
                                        var tweets = RG.tweets;
                                        $.each(tweets, function (key, item) {
                                            swiper.appendSlide($($.tmpl($('#twitter-bottom-template'), item))[0].outerHTML);
                                        });
                                    });

                                } else {
                                    $.each(data.reverse(), function (key, item) {
                                        var name = item.name.split(' ');
                                        item.color = colors[item.color];
                                        item.name = name[0] + ' ' + name[name.length - 1].substr(0, 1) + '.';

                                        var $slider = $($.tmpl($('#survey-bottom-template')
                                            .html(), item));
                                        $slider.attr('style', 'width:100px !important');

                                        swiper.appendSlide($slider[0].outerHTML);
                                    });
                                }
                            };
                        }
                    },
                    live: {
                        markup: $('#live-template')
                            .html(),
                        callback: function ($el) {


                            var getChannelPrograms = function (channel_id) {
                                $.getJSON('/ajax/player/get_tv_guide?tv_channel_id=' + channel_id, function (res) {

                                    if (!res.tv_guide.length) {
                                        $('.tvguide-list-el')
                                            .html('<h4 class="no-content-el" style="width:100%; margin-top:-20px; margin-bottom:30px;"></h4>');
                                        $el.find('.ssv3-tvguide-clock')
                                            .hide();
                                        ssv3.resize();
                                        return false;
                                    }

                                    data = res.tv_guide;
                                    var IMAGE_PATH = res.image_path;

                                    function getHours(timestamp) {
                                        var date = new Date(timestamp * 1000),
                                            hours = date.getHours(),
                                            minutes = '0' + date.getMinutes();

                                        return ('0' + hours).substr(-2) + ':' + minutes.substr(-2);
                                    }

                                    var html = '';
                                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {

                                        var start = getHours(item.startDate),
                                            end = getHours(item.endDate),
                                            type = 'next',
                                            diff = parseInt(item.endDate) - (parseInt((new Date()).getTime()) / 1000),
                                            timeDiff = parseInt(item.endDate) - parseInt(item.startDate);

                                        if (diff < 0) {
                                            type = 'past';
                                        } else {
                                            if (diff <= timeDiff) {
                                                type = 'current';
                                            } else {
                                                type = 'next';
                                            }
                                        }

                                        html +=
                                            '<div class="swiper-slide ssv3-tvguide-list-item ' + type + '">' +
                                            '<img src="' + IMAGE_PATH + item.image + '" alt="">' +
                                            '<div class="ssv3-tvguide-list-item-time">' + start + '-' + end + '</div>' +
                                            '<div class="ssv3-tvguide-list-item-title">' + item.programName + '</div>' +
                                            '</div>';
                                    });

                                    $el.find('.tvguide-list-el')
                                        .html(html);


                                    $el.find('.ssv3-tvguide-clock')
                                        .show();

                                    var firstTime = new Date(parseInt(data[0].startDate) * 1000).getHours(),
                                        endTime = new Date(parseInt(data[data.length - 1].endDate) * 1000).getHours();

                                    var timeHtml = '';
                                    for (var time = firstTime; time <= endTime; time++) {
                                        time = (time.toString().length == 1 ? '0' + time : time);
                                        timeHtml += '<div class="swiper-slide ssv3-tvguide-clock-item hour" data-hour="' + time + '">' + time + ':00' + '</div>';
                                        timeHtml += '<div class="swiper-slide ssv3-tvguide-clock-item min" data-hour="' + time + '">' + time + ':30' + '</div>';
                                    }
                                    timeHtml += '<div class="swiper-slide ssv3-tvguide-clock-item hour" data-hour="' + getHours(endTime) + '">' + getHours(endTime) + '</div>';
                                    $el.find('.tvguide-time-list-el')
                                        .html(timeHtml);


                                    var currentDate = new Date(),
                                        currentHours = currentDate.getHours(),
                                        currentMinutes = currentDate.getMinutes();

                                    $el.find('.time-pin')
                                        .remove();
                                    var $filteredEl = $el.find('.ssv3-tvguide-clock-item[data-hour="' + currentHours + '"]');
                                    var index = $filteredEl.filter('.hour')
                                        .index();

                                    if (currentMinutes > 30) {
                                        currentMinutes -= 30;
                                        $filteredEl = $filteredEl.filter('.min');
                                    } else {
                                        $filteredEl = $filteredEl.filter('.hour');
                                    }
                                    $filteredEl.append($('<span class="time-pin"></span>')
                                        .css('left', ((100 / 30) * currentMinutes) + '%'));

                                    new Swiper('.ssv3-tvguide-list > .swiper-container, .ssv3-tvguide-clock .swiper-container', {
                                        slidesPerView: 'auto',
                                        centeredSlides: false,
                                        spaceBetween: 0,
                                        initialSlide: index
                                    });

                                    ssv3.resize();
                                });
                            };

                            $.getJSON('/ajax/player/get_channel_list', function (data) {
                                var IMAGE_PATH = data.image_path;
                                data = data.channels;

                                if (!data.length) {
                                    $el.html('<h4 class="no-content-el"></h4>');
                                }

                                var html = '';
                                $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                                    html +=
                                        '<div class="swiper-slide ssv3-tv-guide-item">' +
                                        '<a href="#" data-id="' + item.id + '"><img src="' + IMAGE_PATH + item.image_guide + '" alt=""></a>' +
                                        '</div>';
                                });

                                html = $(html);

                                $el.find('.tvguide-channels-list-el')
                                    .html(html);

                                var swiper = new Swiper('.ssv3-tvguide-channels > .swiper-container', {
                                    spaceBetween: 0,
                                    initialSlide: 0
                                });

                                html.find('a')
                                    .on('click', function (e) {
                                        e.preventDefault();

                                        html.find('a')
                                            .removeClass('active');

                                        var $self = $(this),
                                            id = $self.data('id');

                                        getChannelPrograms(id);

                                        $self.addClass('active');

                                        swiper.slideTo($self.parent()
                                            .index());
                                    });

                                html.find('a')
                                    .eq(0)
                                    .trigger('click');
                            });

                        }
                    },
                    twitter: {
                        markup: $('#twitter-template')
                            .html(),
                        callback: function ($el) {
                            var $listEl = $el.find('.bottom-list-el');
                            $listEl.empty();

                            RG.pullTweets(SecondScreen.itemId, function () {
                                var tweets = RG.tweets;
                                $.each(tweets, function (key, item) {
                                    $listEl.append($.tmpl($('#twitter-bottom-template'), item));
                                });

                                var swiperSurveyBottom = new Swiper('.ssv3-bottom-twitter > .swiper-container', {
                                    slidesPerView: 'auto',
                                    spaceBetween: 0,
                                    centeredSlides: true,
                                    autoplay: 3000,
                                    nextButton: $el.find('.ssv3-content-survey-bottom .swiper-button-next')
                                        .get(0),
                                    prevButton: $el.find('.ssv3-content-survey-bottom .swiper-button-prev')
                                        .get(0)
                                });
                            });


                            var href = window.location.href,
                                $textarea = $el.find('textarea'),
                                hashtag = $textarea.data('hashtag'),
                                $parent = $textarea.parent(),
                                $spanEl = $('<span class="not-editable-text">' + hashtag + '</span>');

                            var calculateChar = function () {
                                var length = charactersleft(hashtag + ' ' + $('.ssv3-twitter-textarea textarea')
                                    .val() + ' ' + href);
                                $('.ssv3-twitter-char-count span')
                                    .html(length);
                            };

                            $textarea.unbind('keyup')
                                .bind('keyup', function (e) {
                                    calculateChar();
                                });

                            $spanEl.prependTo($parent);
                            $textarea.css('text-indent', $spanEl.width() + 3);

                            $el.find('.tweet-button')
                                .unbind('click')
                                .bind('click', function () {
                                    var val = hashtag + ' ' + $textarea.val();
                                    if (val) {
                                        val = val.replace('\n' + href, '');
                                    }
                                    var url = [
                                        'http://twitter.com/share?text=' + encodeURIComponent(val),
                                        '&url=' + window.location.href
                                    ].join('');

                                    window.open(url, '', 'width=500,height=500', '_blank');
                                });

                            calculateChar();
                        }
                    },
                    facebook: {
                        markup: $('#facebook-template')
                            .html(),
                        callback: function ($el) {
                            $.getScript('//connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js#xfbml=1&version=v2.4', function () {
                            });

                            var image = $('meta[property="og:image"]')
                                .attr('content');

                            if (image) {
                                $el.find('.ssv3-facebook-photo img')
                                    .attr('src', image)
                                    .show();
                                $el.find('.ssv3-facebook-detail')
                                    .css({
                                        width: '',
                                        height: ''
                                    });
                            } else {
                                $el.find('.ssv3-facebook-photo')
                                    .hide();
                                $el.find('.ssv3-facebook-detail')
                                    .css({
                                        width: 360,
                                        height: 'auto'
                                    });
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            });


            window.ssv3 = ssv3;

            var surveySelected = false;
            var multipleSurvey = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'multiple',
                template: $('#multiple-template')
                    .html(),

                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {
                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });

                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = parseInt((parseInt(item) / parseInt(totalAnswer)) * 100);
                        }

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');
                    });
                },

                show: function ($el, data) {
                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    $el.find('.ssv3-survey-multiple-list li')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();

                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;

                            $('.ssv3-survey-multiple-list li')
                                .removeClass('active')
                                .css('background-color', '');


                            var $self = $(this);
                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                var color = $self.data('color'),
                                    id = $self.data('id');

                                $self.addClass('active')
                                    .css('background-color', convertHex(color, 50));

                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };

                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }
                        });
                }
            });

            var photoSurvey = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'photo',
                template: $('#photo-template')
                    .html(),

                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {

                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });


                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = parseInt((parseInt(item) / parseInt(totalAnswer)) * 100);
                        }

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');
                    });
                },

                show: function ($el, data) {

                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    if ($('.ssv3-survey-photo').length) {
                        /*var swiperSurveyPhoto = */
                        new Swiper('.ssv3-survey-photo > .swiper-container', {
                            slidesPerView: 'auto',
                            centeredSlides: false,
                            initialSlide: 1,
                            //paginationClickable: true,
                            //pagination: '.ssv3-survey-photo .swiper-pagination',
                            spaceBetween: 0,
                            nextButton: '.ssv3-survey-photo .swiper-button-next',
                            prevButton: '.ssv3-survey-photo .swiper-button-prev'
                        });
                    }

                    $el.find('.ssv3-survey-photo-item')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function () {

                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;

                            var $self = $(this),
                                color = $self.data('color'),
                                id = $self.data('id');

                            $('.ssv3-survey-photo-item')
                                .removeClass('selected');
                            $('.ssv3-survey-photo-item-selected')
                                .remove();


                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                $self.addClass('selected');
                                $self.append('<div class="ssv3-survey-photo-item-selected" style="background: ' + color + '"></div>');

                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };

                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }
                        });
                }
            });

            var yesnoSurvey = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'yesno',
                template: $('#yesno-template')
                    .html(),

                data: function (data) {
                    data.question_info.answers = $.map(data.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                        item.text = item.text.turkishToUpper();

                        return item;
                    });

                    return data;
                },

                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {
                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });

                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = Math.round(((parseInt(item) / totalAnswer) * 100));
                        }

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');

                        percent /= 10;
                        if (percent != 0) {
                            $('#question_' + question_id + '_bullet_' + key)
                                .find('li')
                                .eq(parseInt(percent) - 1)
                                .addClass('active')
                                .prevAll('li')
                                .addClass('active');
                        }
                    });
                },

                show: function ($el, data) {

                    function resize() {
                        var $bullet = $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-bullet');
                        $bullet.find('li')
                            .hide();

                        var $percent = $bullet.next('.ssv3-survey-yesno-percent');
                        var bulletWidth = (($('.ssv3-survey-yesno-vote-inner')
                            .width() - 100) - ($percent.length ? $percent.width() : 0)) / 10;
                        $bullet.find('li')
                            .css('width', bulletWidth - 2)
                            .show();
                    }

                    resize();

                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    $('.ssv3-survey-yesno .ssv3-survey-yesno-vote button')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function () {

                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;

                            $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-vote')
                                .removeClass('voted');
                            $('.ssv3-survey-yesno .ssv3-survey-yesno-vote button')
                                .removeClass('voted');

                            var $self = $(this),
                                id = $self.data('id');

                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                $self.closest('.ssv3-survey-yesno-vote')
                                    .addClass('voted');
                                $self.addClass('voted');

                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };
                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }
                        });
                }
            });

            var barometreSurvey = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'barometre',
                template: $('#barometre-template')
                    .html(),

                data: function (data) {
                    data.question_info.answers = $.map(data.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                        item.text = item.text.turkishToUpper();

                        return item;
                    });

                    return data;
                },


                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {
                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });

                    var info = {
                        answers: []
                    };

                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = Math.round(((parseInt(item) / totalAnswer) * 100));
                        }

                        info.answers.push({
                            percent: percent
                        });

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');
                    });

                    if (info.answers.length == 1) {
                        info.answers.push({
                            percent: 0
                        });
                    }

                    if (info.answers[0].percent > info.answers[1].percent) {
                        info.barometre_percent = '-' + ((45 / 100 * info.answers[0].percent) + 5) + 'deg';
                    } else if (info.answers[0].percent < info.answers[1].percent) {
                        info.barometre_percent = ((45 / 100 * info.answers[1].percent) + 5) + 'deg';
                    } else {
                        info.barometre_percent = '0deg';
                    }

                    $('#question_' + question_id + '_arrow')
                        .css('transform', 'rotate(' + info.barometre_percent + ')');
                },

                show: function ($el, data) {
                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    $('.ssv3-survey-balance-el button')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function () {
                            $('.ssv3-survey-balance-el button')
                                .removeClass('voted');

                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;


                            var $self = $(this),
                                id = $self.data('id');

                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                $self.addClass('voted');
                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };

                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }

                        });

                }
            });

            var pieSurvey = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'pie',
                template: $('#pie-template')
                    .html(),

                data: function (data) {
                    data.question_info.answers = $.map(data.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                        item.text = item.text.turkishToUpper();

                        return item;
                    });

                    return data;
                },


                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {
                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });

                    var totalAnswerCount = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = Math.round(parseInt(item) / totalAnswer * 100);
                        }

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');

                        totalAnswerCount += item;
                    });

                    var pieData = $.map(this.model.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                            return {
                                value: totalAnswerCount != 0 ? data[item.id] || 0 : 25,
                                color: item.color,
                                highlight: item.color,
                                label: item.text
                            };
                        }),
                        options = {
                            segmentShowStroke: false
                        };

                    var $chart = $('#pieChart');
                    if ($chart.length) {
                        new Chart($chart.get(0)
                            .getContext('2d')).Doughnut(pieData, options);
                    }
                },

                show: function ($el, data) {
                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    $('.ssv3-survey-pie-button-wrapper button')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function (e) {
                            e.preventDefault();

                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;

                            var $self = $(this),
                                $parent = $self.parent('.ssv3-survey-pie-button-wrapper'),
                                color = $parent.data('color'),
                                id = $self.data('id');

                            $('.ssv3-survey-pie-button-wrapper')
                                .removeClass('active')
                                .css('background-color', '');


                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                $parent.addClass('active')
                                    .css({
                                        background: convertHex(color, 40)
                                    });

                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };

                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }
                        });

                    var pieData = $.map(this.model.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                            return {
                                value: 25,
                                color: item.color,
                                highlight: item.color,
                                label: item.text
                            };
                        }),
                        options = {
                            segmentShowStroke: false
                        };

                    var $chart = $('#pieChart');
                    if ($chart.length) {
                        var myDoughnutChart = new Chart($chart.get(0)
                            .getContext('2d')).Doughnut(pieData, options);
                    }
                }
            });

            var surveyYesNoType2 = new ssv3.survey({
                name: 'yesnoType2',
                template: $('#yesno-type2-template')
                    .html(),

                data: function (data) {
                    data.question_info.answers = $.map(data.question_info.answers, function (item) {
                        item.text = item.text.turkishToUpper();

                        return item;
                    });

                    return data;
                },

                updateStats: function (question_id, data) {
                    var totalAnswer = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {
                        totalAnswer += parseInt(item);
                    });

                    var percents = {},
                        index = 0;
                    $.each(data, function (key, item) {

                        var percent = 0;

                        if (totalAnswer != 0) {
                            percent = Math.round(((parseInt(item) / totalAnswer) * 100));
                        }

                        percents[index] = percent / 10;

                        $('#question_' + question_id + '_answer_' + key)
                            .html(percent + '%');

                        index++;
                    });

                    var answer1Percent = percents[0],
                        answer2Percent = percents[1];

                    var $bullets = $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-bullet-type2 li');

                    if (answer1Percent != 0 || answer2Percent != 0) {
                        $.each($bullets, function (key, item) {
                            var $self = $(item),
                                _key = key + 1;

                            if (_key <= answer1Percent) {
                                $self.addClass('active');
                            } else {
                                $self.addClass('active-no');
                            }
                        });
                    }

                },

                show: function ($el, data) {
                    this.updateStats(data.question_info.id, data.choices);

                    var width = $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-vote-type2 .ssv3-survey-yesno-vote-inner')
                        .width() - (130 * 2) - 20;
                    var $bullets = $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-bullet-type2 li');

                    $bullets.css('width', width / 10);

                    $('.ssv3-survey-yesno-type2 .ssv3-survey-yesno-vote button')
                        .off('click')
                        .on('click', function () {
                            if (surveySelected != false) {
                                return false;
                            }
                            surveySelected = true;

                            var $self = $(this),
                                type = $self.hasClass('yes') ? 'yes' : 'no',
                                id = $self.data('id');

                            var $wrapper = $self.closest('.ssv3-survey-yesno-inner'),
                                $inner = $self.closest('.ssv3-survey-yesno-vote-inner'),
                                $bullets = $inner.find('.ssv3-survey-yesno-bullet');

                            $wrapper.find('.ssv3-survey-balance-bg')
                                .remove();

                            $wrapper.find('button')
                                .removeClass('voted');


                            var checkAnswer = function () {
                                $self.addClass('voted');

                                var $active,
                                    left,
                                    width;
                                if (type == 'yes') {
                                    $active = $bullets.find('li.active:last');
                                    if ($active.length) {
                                        left = $active.position().left;
                                        width = $active.width() + left;

                                        $inner.prepend($('<div class="ssv3-survey-balance-bg ssv3-survey-balance-bg-yes"></div>')
                                            .css({
                                                width: width + 1
                                            }));
                                    }
                                } else {
                                    $active = $bullets.find('li.active-no:first');
                                    if ($active.length) {
                                        left = $active.position().left;
                                        width = $inner.outerWidth(true) - left + 1;

                                        $inner.prepend($('<div class="ssv3-survey-balance-bg ssv3-survey-balance-bg-no"></div>')
                                            .css({
                                                width: width,
                                                left: 'auto',
                                                right: 0
                                            }));
                                    }
                                }

                                sendAnswer(data.poll_info.id, data.question_info.id, id, data.seen_at, data.hash, data.poll_info.is_persistent, $self);
                            };

                            if (RG.currentMemberId || window.requiredMember != '1') {
                                checkAnswer();
                            } else {
                                RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                                    checkAnswer();
                                });

                                return $('#login-link')
                                    .trigger('click');
                            }
                        });
                }
            });

            var questionStorage = {},
                pollStorage = {},
                questionTypes = {
                    'A1': photoSurvey,
                    'A2': multipleSurvey,
                    'A3': pieSurvey,
                    'B': {
                        column: surveyYesNoType2,
                        bar: yesnoSurvey,
                        barometre: barometreSurvey
                    }
                },
                lastPoll = null;

            function sendAnswer(poll_id, question_id, question_choice_id, seen_at, hash, is_persistent, $button) {
                ssv3.sendAnswer({
                    poll_id: poll_id,
                    question_id: question_id,
                    question_choice_id: question_choice_id,
                    item_id: SecondScreen.itemId,
                    seen_at: seen_at,
                    hash: hash
                }, function (res) {
                    surveySelected = false;

                    if (res.message == 'not_logged_in') {
                        RG.login_callback.push(function () {
                            sendAnswer(poll_id, question_id, question_choice_id, seen_at, hash);
                        });

                        return $('#login-link')
                            .trigger('click');
                    }

                    //if(is_persistent != "1"){

                    if (typeof res.show_correct_answer != 'undefined') {
                        if (typeof res.is_correct_choice != 'undefined' && res.is_correct_choice == 1) { // cevap doğru
                            $button.addClass('correct');
                        } else { // cevap yanlış
                            var correctChoiceId = res.correct_choice_id;

                            $button.addClass('incorrect');
                            $button.closest('.ssv3-survey-content')
                                .find('[data-id="' + correctChoiceId + '"]')
                                .addClass('correct');
                        }
                    }

                    if (typeof res.move_to_second != 'undefined') {
                        window.kdp.sendNotification('doSeek', parseInt(res.move_to_second));
                    } else if (typeof res.move_to_url != 'undefined') {
                        window.kdp.sendNotification('doPause');
                        return window.location.href = res.move_to_url;
                    } else if (typeof res.move_to_video_id != 'undefined') {
                        RG.widget.load('video_player', $player, '&embed_code_only=1&video_id=' + res.move_to_video_id);
                    } else {
                        if (res.question_id != '-1') {
                            setTimeout(function () {
                                getPoll(poll_id, res.question_id, null, true);
                            }, 3 * 1000);
                        }
                    }


                    var closeActions = function () {
                        var noContentText = "",
                            lastPollInfo = lastPoll.poll_info,
                            showResult = false;

                        if (lastPollInfo && lastPollInfo.show_results == '1') {
                            showResult = true;
                            var $html = $($.tmpl($('#poll-result-template')
                                .html(), lastPollInfo));
                            $('.ssv3-container-types[data-type="survey"] .ssv3-survey-content')
                                .empty()
                                .append($html);

                            var $img = $html.find('img');
                            if ($img.length) {
                                $img.load(function () {
                                    ssv3.resize();
                                })
                                    .bind('error', function () {
                                        ssv3.resize();
                                    });
                            } else {
                                ssv3.resize();
                            }
                        }

                        if (showResult == false) {
                            $('.ssv3-container-types[data-type="survey"] .ssv3-survey-content')
                                .html('<h4 class="no-content-el">' + noContentText + '</h4>')
                                .addClass('no-content');
                            closePoll();
                        }

                        $('.ssv3-notification-el')
                            .hide();

                        if (window.kdp) {
                            window.kdp.sendNotification('doPlay');
                        }
                    };

                    if (res.question_id == '-1') {
                        if (typeof res.show_correct_answer != 'undefined') { // cevapların doğruluğu yanlışlığı gösteriliyorsa 3 saniye bekletiliyor
                            setTimeout(function () {
                                closeActions();
                            }, 3 * 1000);
                        } else {
                            closeActions();
                        }
                    }


                    //}


                });
            }


            var video_polls = null;
            $.get('/api/secondscreen/videoPolls?item_id=' + SecondScreen.itemId, function (res) {
                video_polls = res;
            });

            window.getPollWithSecond = function (second) {
                for (var key in video_polls) {
                    var data = video_polls[key];

                    if (second == parseInt(data.second) - 2) {
                        getPoll(data.pollID);
                    }
                }
            };

            window.showPolls = function (second) {
                for (var key in video_polls) {
                    var data = video_polls[key];

                    if (second == parseInt(data.second)) {
                        if (typeof pollStorage[data.pollID] != 'undefined') {
                            showPoll(pollStorage[data.pollID]);
                        } else {
                            if (data.pause_video == '1') {
                                window.kdp.sendNotification('doPause');
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            };


            var showPoll = function (res, callback) {
                callback = typeof callback == 'function' ? callback : function (){};
                callback(res);

                lastPoll = res;

                ssv3.openContainer('survey');
                $('.ssv3-container-types[data-type="survey"] .ssv3-survey-content')
                    .removeClass('no-content');

                var questionInfo = res.question_info;

                if (!res.poll_info.voteCount) {
                    res.poll_info.voteCount = 0;
                }

                if (typeof questionTypes[questionInfo.pollType] != 'undefined') {
                    var type;
                    if (typeof questionTypes[questionInfo.pollType][questionInfo.chartType] != 'undefined') {
                        type = questionTypes[questionInfo.pollType][questionInfo.chartType];

                        questionStorage[questionInfo.id] = type;

                        type.set(res);
                    } else {
                        type = questionTypes[questionInfo.pollType];

                        questionStorage[questionInfo.id] = type;

                        type.set(res);
                    }

                    type.show();

                    if (res.poll_info.popup_video == '1') {
                        ssv3.open();
                    }

                    if (res.poll_info.pause_video == '1') {
                        window.kdp.sendNotification('doPause');
                    }

                    var icon = res.poll_info.icon_image;
                    if (icon) {
                        $('.ssv3-holder .ssv3-notification-el')
                            .css('background-image', 'url(' + icon + ')')
                            .removeClass('default')
                            .show();
                    } else {
                        $('.ssv3-holder .ssv3-notification-el')
                            .css('background-image', '')
                            .show()
                            .addClass('default');
                    }
                    $('.ssv3-holder')
                        .addClass('visible');
                    $secondScreenEl.css('height', 60);


                    if ($('.ssv3-container')
                        .hasClass('ssv3-survey-open')) {

                        var $img = $('.ssv3-survey-content')
                            .find('img');
                        if ($img.length) {
                            var len = $img.length - 1,
                                i = 0;

                            $img.load(function () {
                                i++;

                                if (i == len) {
                                    ssv3.resize();
                                }
                            })
                                .bind('error', function () {
                                    ssv3.resize();
                                });
                        } else {
                            ssv3.resize();
                        }

                    }

                    var timelimit = parseInt(res.poll_info.time_limit)
                        .toString();
                    if (timelimit != '0') {
                        $('#ssv3-timer')
                            .show()
                            .next('white-line')
                            .show();
                        ssv3.startTime(parseInt(res.poll_info.time_limit)
                            .toString(), function (time) {
                            if (time.toString()
                                .substr(0, 2) == '00') {
                                time = time.substr(3, time.length);
                            }

                            $('#ssv3-timer time')
                                .html(time);

                            if (time == '00:00:00') {
                                ssv3.time = null;
                                return closePoll(true);
                            }
                        });
                    } else {
                        $('#ssv3-timer')
                            .hide()
                            .next('.white-line')
                            .hide();
                    }

                }
            };

            var getPoll = function (poll_id, question_id, callback, fromAdmin) {
                callback = typeof callback == 'function' ? callback : function (){};

                ssv3.get('/api/secondscreen/poll', {
                    poll_id: poll_id,
                    question_id: question_id
                }, function (res) {

                    var choices = {};
                    $.each(res.choices, function (key, item) {
                        choices[item.id] = item.answers;
                    });

                    res.choices = choices;

                    var second = parseInt(res.poll_info.second);
                    if (fromAdmin) {
                        showPoll(res, callback);
                    } else {
                        if (window.player_second >= second) {
                            showPoll(res, callback);
                        } else {
                            pollStorage[poll_id] = res;
                        }
                    }

                });
            };

            var closePoll = function (isEmpty) {
                ssv3.close();
                //$('#secondscreen').hide();
                $('.ssv3-wrapper .ssv3-notification-el')
                    .hide();
                $('.ssv3-holder')
                    .removeClass('visible');

                if (isEmpty) {
                    $('.ssv3-container-types[data-type="survey"]')
                        .empty();
                }

                $secondScreenEl.css('height', 25);
            };

            window.poll_start = true;
            window.oldPollId = 0;
            SecondScreen.loadPoll = function (poll_id, question_id, callback) {
                $('#secondscreen')
                    .show();

                $('.ssv3-wrapper .ssv3-notification-el')
                    .css('display', 'inline-block');
                $('.ssv3-holder')
                    .addClass('visible');
                $secondScreenEl.css('height', 60);

                if (poll_id == window.oldPollId) {
                    closePoll();
                }

                window.oldPollId = poll_id;
                getPoll(poll_id, question_id, null, true);
            };

            SecondScreen.closePoll = function (poll_id) {
                //$('#secondscreen').hide();
                ssv3.close();
                window.oldPollId = 0;
                $('.ssv3-wrapper .ssv3-notification-el')
                    .hide();
                $('.ssv3-holder')
                    .removeClass('visible');

                $secondScreenEl.css('height', 25);
            };


            SecondScreen.updateStats = function (poll_id, data) {

                if (data.answer_user.length) {
                    window.renderAnsweredUsers(data.answer_user);
                }

                for (var pollId in data.data) {
                    var poll = data[pollId];

                    for (var questionId in poll) {
                        var question = poll[questionId],
                            surveyObj = questionStorage[questionId];

                        if (typeof surveyObj != 'undefined') {
                            surveyObj.updateStats(questionId, question.answers ||{} );
                        }

                        /*
                         for(var answerId in question){
                         var answer = question[answerId];

                         console.log(answer);
                         }*/
                    }
                }
            };

        });
</script>
<script>
    var lastSecond = null;

    function secondScreenUpdateHandler(data, id) {
        var second = parseInt(data);

        if (second != lastSecond) {
            lastSecond = second;

            window.player_second = second;
            SecondScreen.videoInfo.duration = second;
            window.getPollWithSecond(second);
            window.showPolls(second);
        }
    }

    var defualtReadyCallback = window.kdpReadyCallback;
    window.kdpReadyCallback = function (playerId) {
        defualtReadyCallback(playerId);

        if (typeof kWidget != 'undefined') {
            window.kdp = document.getElementById(playerId);
            window.kdp.addJsListener('playerUpdatePlayhead', 'secondScreenUpdateHandler');
        }
    };

    //    kWidget.addReadyCallback( function( playerId ){
    //        window.kdp = document.getElementById( playerId );
    //        window.kdp.addJsListener("playerUpdatePlayhead", "playerUpdatePlayheadHandler");
    //    });

</script>

<style type="text/css">
    .header_bottom {
        z-index: 1044;
    }
</style>

<div><div class="sweet-overlay" tabindex="-1"></div><div class="sweet-alert" tabindex="-1"><div class="icon error"><span class="x-mark"><span class="line left"></span><span class="line -24 20.5 -44t25 -38.5t22.5 -29t26 -29.5t23 -25q1 -1 4 -4.5t4.5 -5t4 -5t3.5 -5.5l2.5 -5t2 -6t0.5 -6.5t-1 -6.5q-3 -14 -13 -22t-22 -7q-50 7 -86 16q-154 40 -278 128q-90 -16 -176 -16q-271 0 -472 132q58 -4 88 -4q161 0 309 45t264 129 q125 92 192 212t67 254q0 77 -23 152q129 -71 204 -178t75 -230q0 -120 -71 -224.5t-195 -176.5z" transform="scale(.195, -.195) translate(600, -2000)"></path></g></svg></div></div><div id="minimize-messages" class=" message-left bottom"></div></div></iframe></div><iframe height="0" width="0" style="display: none; visibility: hidden;" src="//5434011.fls.doubleclick.net/activityi;src=5434011;type=remar0;cat=kiehl0;ord=9464072897015;gtm=2wg7i2;auiddc=1515643366.1564258747;u1=homepage;u2=undefined;u3=undefined;u4=undefined;u5=undefined;u6=undefined;u7=undefined;~oref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.kiehls.com.tr%2F?"></iframe><style>.designstudio-animated 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeInUp {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);}to designstudio-fadeInDown {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeInDown {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeInLeft {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}.designstudio-fadeInLeft {-webkit-animation-name: designstudio-fadeInLeft;animation-name: designstudio-fadeInLeft;}@-webkit-keyframes designstudio-fadeInRight {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeInRight {from {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(100%, 0, 0);}to {opacity: 1;-webkit-transform: none;transform: none;}}.designstudio-fadeInRight {-webkit-animation-name: designstudio-fadeInRight;animation-name: designstudio-fadeInRight;}@-webkit-keyframes designstudio-fadeOutUp {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeOutUp {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, -100%, 0);}}.designstudio-fadeOutUp {-webkit-animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutUp;animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutUp;}@-webkit-keyframes designstudio-fadeOutDown {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeOutDown {from {opacity: 1; }to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);transform: translate3d(0, 100%, 0);}}.designstudio-fadeOutDown {-webkit-animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutDown;animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutDown;}@-webkit-keyframes designstudio-fadeOutLeft {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);}}@keyframes designstudio-fadeOutLeft {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity: 0;-webkit-transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);transform: translate3d(-100%, 0, 0);}}.designstudio-fadeOutLeft {-webkit-animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutLeft;animation-name: designstudio-fadeOutLeft;}@-webkit-keyframes designstudio-fadeOutRight {from {opacity: 1;}to {opacity:
